SELECT * FROM "TstUser" usr
JOIN "TstOrgUserRelation" r ON r."userId" = usr.id
WHERE TRUE
AND ( usr.nickname LIKE '%${keywords}%' OR usr.email LIKE '%${keywords}%' OR usr.phone LIKE '%${keywords}%' )
AND usr.disabled = #{disabled}
AND r."orgId" = #{orgId} AND NOT usr.deleted ORDER BY usr.id ASC

select usr.id, usr.nickname from "TstUser" usr where usr.id = any ( select "userId" from _project_user(#{prjId}) ) ORDER by usr.id ASC
LIMIT 10

SELECT usr.*, s."leftSizeDesign", s."leftSizeExe", s."issueView" FROM "TstUser" usr JOIN "TstUserSettings" s ON s."userId" = usr.id
WHERE usr.id = #{id}

SELECT usr.*, s."leftSizeDesign", s."leftSizeExe", s."issueView", s."issueColumns"
FROM "TstUser" usr JOIN "TstUserSettings" s ON s."userId" = usr.id
WHERE usr.email = #{email} AND NOT usr.disabled AND NOT usr.deleted
LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: insert into "TstUser" (email, password, nickname, phone, avatar, token, salt, "defaultOrgId", "defaultOrgName", "defaultPrjId", "defaultPrjName", deleted, disabled, "createTime") values (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{avatar}, #{token}, #{temp}, #{defaultOrgId}, #{defaultOrgName}, #{defaultPrjId}, #{defaultPrjName}, #{deleted}, #{disabled}, #{createTime})
